snippet: There were reports of fierce fighting in at least three provinces on Friday, threatening negotiations underway in Switzerland to end Yemen’s civil war.
abstract: Fierce fighting in three of Yemen's provinces threatens negotiations to end country's nine-month civil war between government forces, backed by Saudi-led military coalition, and Houthi rebels; groups accuse each other of breaking cease-fire, but none have left United Nations-brokered talks.
lead_paragraph: There were reports of fierce fighting in at least three provinces on Friday, threatening negotiations underway in Switzerland to end Yemen’s civil war.

headline.main: Fighting in Yemen After Cease-Fire Threatens Negotiations
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Yemen: Fighting Follows Truce
